info.title: ComputeDiskAdminManagementClient
info.description: The Admin Compute Disk Management Client.

get.description: Returns a list of disk migration jobs.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The parameters of disk migration job status.

200.description: OK -- The list of disk migration jobs has been returned.

migrationSubTaskId.description: The id of migration child task.

sourceShare.description: The source share of migration task.

targetShare.description: The target share of migration task.
The target share of migration job.

get.description: Returns the requested disk migration job.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: OK -- The disk migration job has been returned.

migrationSubTaskId.description: The id of migration child task.

sourceShare.description: The source share of migration task.

targetShare.description: The target share of migration task.
The target share of migration job.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

actualSizeGB.description: The actual size of disk in GB.

managedBy.description: Compute resource Uri which owns this disk.

provisionSizeGB.description: The provision size of disk in GB.

userResourceId.description: The disk resource Uri from user view.

200.description: OK --  Disk migration job is created successfully.

migrationSubTaskId.description: The id of migration child task.

sourceShare.description: The source share of migration task.

targetShare.description: The target share of migration task.
The target share of migration job.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: OK --  Disk migration job cancellation is called.
